story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1101_0100_20:
Days later, Blue and the gang were on
high alert for Team Rocket’s shenanigans.
story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Don’t think we’ll forget about this!
story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
They did say Team Rocket’s been attacking
more lately.
story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: But I wasn’t expecting quite this much.
story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yeah... We have to do something about
this—and fast.
story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Hey, Chase! Elaine! Got a moment?
story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Hate to bother ya, but could you come here?
story_arceus_07_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I found their boss, so I’m gonna have a
little chat with them.
